mapper.sql: select attachment_id, business_type, business_id, document_type, file_name, file_path, file_size, file_type, file_description, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from pm_attachment
mapper.select: select a.attachment_id, a.business_type, a.business_id, a.document_type, a.file_name, a.file_path, a.file_size, a.file_type, a.file_description, a.del_flag, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time, a.remark, dict.dict_label as document_type_name, u.nick_name as create_by_name from pm_attachment a left join sys_dict_data dict on a.document_type = dict.dict_value and dict.dict_type = 'sys_wdlx' left join sys_user u on a.create_by = u.user_name where a.del_flag = '0' and a.business_type = #{businessType} and a.business_id = #{businessId} order by a.create_time desc
